During your turn, your other ::Human:: and ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters gain +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 5 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: in your Waiting Room, put it in your hand, choose 1 of your other ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may move this to an empty Front Row Center Slot.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2500 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, if all your Characters are either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Making the Best Memories" is in your Climax Zone, look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library, search them for up to 1 Character with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, reveal it, put it in your hand, put the rest in the Waiting Room, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character, for the turn this gains +4000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, you may choose a Character in your Waiting Room with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: and put it in your Stock.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, look at the top card of your Library and place it back on top of your Library or into your Waiting Room."

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] During the turn that this is placed from hand to the Stage, at the start of your Attack Phase, you may put all Characters of all players except this card in their respective Waiting Rooms. If so, this gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When Damage from this Character is Cancelled, you may Deal 3 Damage to your Opponent" (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[C] All your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: gain +500 Power.
[S] [(2) Rest this] Choose a Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] Your other "Elma, First Computer" gain +500 Power and the following ability. "[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: is Front Attacked, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Battling Characters and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power."
[A] BOND/"Elma, First Computer" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
--None--
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] This gains +2000 Power for each of your Opponent's Back Row Characters.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::.
[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may Send that Character to Memory.
Choose 1 of your Characters and put it in the Waiting Room. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Climax card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] If you have another "Tohru, Wings of Love", your other ::Human:: and ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters gains +100 Power.
[S] [Rest this] If you have 4 or more other Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, draw a card and discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If you have 4 or more Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] RESONANCE [Reveal a "Kobayashi-san, Trusting Relationship with Dragon" from your hand to your Opponent] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of the following 2 effects and perform it. "Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." "Put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room." (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "The Words I Wanted to Convey" is in your Climax Zone and you have another ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character, choose 1 of the following 2 effects and perform it. "Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent." "[(2) Discard a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] You may pay cost. If so, declare a number of your choice. Deal X Damage to your Opponent. X is equal to the declared number." (You may not declare a negative number. Damage Cancel may occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, put it in your Stock. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Put this in the Waiting Room] When your other Character is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, if this is in the Back Row, you may pay cost. If so, put that Character Rested in the Slot it was in.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +3000 Power for the turn.
[A] BOND/"Kobayashi-san, Trusting Relationship with Dragon" [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[S] BRAINSTORM [(1)] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] Your other Character in the Front Row Center Slot gains +1 Soul.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with either ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage or at the beginning of your Main Phase, choose 1 of the following 2 abilities and this gains that ability for the turn. "[C] During your turn, if you have another ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character, this gains +3000 Power." "[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD) Characters:: and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power."
[A] CX COMBO [Choose a "Around That Playful Age" in your Climax Zone ans place it in your Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Encore Step, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] [Discard a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if all your Characters are ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon(KMD)::, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 Character with RESONANCE or "Kobayashi-san, Trusting Relationship with Dragon", show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and Shuffle your Library.
[S] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room, put this in the Waiting Room] Choose a Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If you have another "Kobayashi-san, Trusting Relationship with Dragon" this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that Character gains +1500 Power and the following ability. "[C] This may not be chosen by your Opponent's effects".
[A] RESONANCE [Reveal a "Kobayashi-san, Trusting Relationship with Dragon" from hand] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, draw a card, choose a card from your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 2 cards from top of your Library and put them on top of your Library in any order.
[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and move it to another vacant Slot on your Opponent's Stage, and this gain +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other Characters with either ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: and return it to your hand.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, Send that card to your Opponent's Memory."
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1500 Power.

[C] All your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest this] Choose a card in your Level and Character in your Waiting Room with ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: and Swap them.

[A] When this Direct Attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.
[A] At the start of your Opponent's Draw Phase, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 1 or higher, you may return this to your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[S] BRAINSTORM [(1)] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, perform the following action. "Choose a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character in your Waiting Room, return it to hand, choose a card in your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room."

[A] When one of your other ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters attacks, declare a number less than or equal to the number of Markers under this card, and for the turn, that Character gains +1000 Power and +X Soul. X is equal to the declared number. (Negative numbers cannot be declared)
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Put a "Stretch Your Wings" from your Climax Zone into your Waiting Room] At the beginning of your Attack Phase, if you have 4 or more other Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 3 Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD):: from among them, show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, put the remaining cards in your Waiting Room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your Library underneath this faceup as Marker.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if there are 5 or fewer cards in your Stock, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room. If there's a Climax card among them, reveal the top 2 cards of your Library, your Opponent chooses a Character or an Event among those cards and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

Your Opponent puts all of their Stock to the Waiting Room, puts the same number of cards from the top of their Library to their Stock, you choose up to 1 Character from your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 Level 1 or lower Character in your Waiting Room, put it to Stock, and for the turn all of your Characters gains +1 Soul.

[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Power of a Dragon" is in your Climax Zone and you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in your Waiting Room.

[A] CX COMBO [(1)] When "Looking for Treasure" is placed to your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn this gains the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card' Damage is Cancelled, you may Deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the Soul of this card." (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] When this attacks, reveal the top card of your Library. If the revealed card is a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character, you may Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur. Put the revealed card back)

[A] When this is placed from the hand to the Stage, choose one of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability until the next end of your Opponent's turn. "[A] This Character cannot be Reversed by your Opponent's Character's [A] effects."
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your Waiting Room with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: and return it to your hand.
[A] [Return this to your hand] When your Climax card is placed in the Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power until the next end of your Opponent's turn.

[C] If all of your Characters have "Tohru" or "Elma" in name, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(1)] During the turn this was placed from hand to the Stage, if the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character from your Waiting Room with "Tohru" or "Elma" in name and return it to your hand.

[C] If you have 2 or more other Characters with "Ilulu" and/or "Taketo" in name, this card gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1)] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other Characters with "Ilulu" and/or "Taketo" in name, you may pay cost. If so, for this attack this card performs Trigger Check twice during the Trigger Step.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1)] This ability activates up to once per turn. If your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax with a Treasure Trigger Icon, you may pay cost. If so, Deal 1 Damage to your Opponent. (Damage Cancel can occur)
[A] CX COMBO [(3) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates up to once per turn. When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Otaku's Serious Game" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, Stand this.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, draw up to 2 cards, and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[A] [Discard 2 cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, put the bottom 4 cards of your Opponent's Library in the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X = # of Climax cards among them. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and your Opponent puts that Character from Memory to any Slot on their Stage.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [(1) Put this in the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All of your Characters in front of this gain the following ability. "[C] The card Opposite this cannot move to another Slot."
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest 2 of your Characters] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] During battles involving this, your Opponent cannot play BACKUP from hand.
[A] When this attacks, if the Character Opposite this is Level 2, for the turn this gains +6000 Power.

[A] [(2)] When you use the BACKUP of this, you may pay cost. If so, return all cards in your Waiting Room to the Library and shuffle your Library.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] For each of your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this attacks, if you have another "Fafnir, Serious Withdrawal", look at up to 2 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 2 of those cards and put them on top of your Library in any order, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, choose a Character in your Opponent's Front Row, and that Character gets -1000 Power for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] [Return 2 Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD):: from your Waiting Room to your Library, Shuffle your Library] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Characters and for the turn it gains the following ability. "[C] This card's Side Attack is without Soul Penalty."
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters with "Ilulu" in name, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, it gains the following ability. "[C] During your Opponent's turn this gains +2000 Power."

[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from top of your Library and search for up to 1 Level 1 or higher card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. (Climax cards are considered to be Level 0 for this effect)

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have another Character with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[A] When your Trigger Check reveals a Climax Card with a Treasure Trigger Icon, for the turn this gains +1000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay cost. If so, for this attack this performs Trigger Check twice during the Trigger Step."

[C] This cannot Side Attack.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: among those cards.

[C] You may have as many copies of cards with the same name as this in your deck.

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1 Soul for the turn.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

If that card is Level 2 or lower, for the turn, this gains the following ability. "[A] When this is Front Attacked you may return this to your hand."

[C] During your turn, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battling Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Unveiling a Surprise" is in your Climax Zone and you have 4 or more Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, choose 1 of the 2 following effects and perform it. "Choose a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand." "You may choose 1 of your Opponent's Level 1 or higher Characters. If you do, your Opponent chooses a Level X or lower Character in their Waiting Room, and Swaps their choice and yours. X equals the Level of your chosen Character minus 1."

[C] EXPERIENCE If this sum of the Levels of the cards in your Level Zone is 4 or more, this gains +1000 Power, "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: Character from hand to the Waiting Room", and the card Opposite this gets -1 Soul.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, if "To the Place Where Everyone is Waiting" is in your Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Whole Body Mischief" in your Waiting Room, return it to your hand, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn this gains +2000 Power and the following ability. "[C] The card Opposite this gets -1 Soul."

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more other Characters with ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, you may draw a card. If so, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Put a Character from the Stage to the Waiting Room] At the end of this card's Attack, if "Sprouted Emotions" is in your Climax Zone and you have less than 6 cards in your hand, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character in your hand that is equal to or lower in Level than 1 + your Level and place it to any Slot on your Stage Rested.

[A] During the turn this was placed from hand to the Stage, at the beginning of your Climax Phase, if have another "Kanna, Fearless Plot", Reverse this.
[A] When this Reverses, you may reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your Library. If you reveal 1 or more cards, choose up to 1 Character with ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: from among them, put it in your hand, put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room, choose a card from your hand and discard it to the Waiting Room.

[C] All your other Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: gain +500 Power.
[A] [Discard a Character card with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD):: from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Kanna, Mischievous Little Dragon", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] EXPERIENCE If the sum of Levels of cards in your Level Zone is 4 or higher, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your Characters with either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::.

[A] During the turn this was placed from hand to the Stage, at the beginning of your Attack Phase, you may choose 1 of your other Reversed "Riko Saikawa, Crying" and Stand it.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters with either ::Human:: and/or ::Dragon (KMD)::, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Ilulu, Coexistence with Humans", place if to any Slot on your Stage, Shuffle your Library, and for the turn that card gains +1000 Power and the following ability. "[A] At the end of this turn, place this in your Waiting Room."

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if all your Characters are either ::Human:: or ::Dragon (KMD)::, you may put the top card of your Library in your Stock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]
